# Agent Review Checklist

- [ ] Folder name matches `name` in frontmatter
- [ ] Frontmatter includes `name` and `description`
- [ ] `description` includes trigger keywords
- [ ] `user-invocable` and `target` set as intended
- [ ] Optional fields omitted or commented out unless required
- [ ] Agent body includes role, scope, workflow, and guardrails
- [ ] No secrets or credentials
- [ ] Agent file is under 500 lines
